title: Making Salsa!
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 39 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: What do you need to make salsa? In Making Salsa, a boy shows all the ingredients and the sequence needed to make salsa. At the end, the boy and his mom enjoy what he made. Repetitive phrases and high-frequency words support early readers.
meta: chips, cilantro, lemon juice, onion, pepper, peppers, salsa, salt, tomato
Use the reading strategy of visualizing to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /g/ sound
Periods : Recognize and understand the use of periods at the end of sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word in
